text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1977. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *6 April - Ditte Ylva Olsen, actress *25 April - Eva Harlou, TV host *29 May - Lene Beier, TV host *2 June - Signe Molde-Amelung, TV host *2 November - Thomas Voss, actor *16 November - Vicki Berlin, actress *2 December - David Owe, actor ==Deaths== ==See also== *1977 in Denmark
title: 1977 in Danish television
